xuv_3xo_features.text: [{'url': 'https://ackodrive.com/car-guide/mahindra-xuv-3xo-features-explained/', 'content': 'HOME BUY NEW CAR BLOG Home / Articles / Car Guide / Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Published on 27 Aug, 2024, 9:41 AM IST Updated on 28 Aug, 2024, 5:59 AM IST Team Ackodrive 8 min read Interesting Articles Follow us on Share Post Mahindra recently launched the much-awaited Mahindra XUV 3XO as a compact SUV in the Indian automotive industry. Outperforming its rivals, the Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue and Maruti Suzuki Brezza, the Mahindra XUV 3XO brings a fresh look to the segment. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. Contents Price of Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants After the Mahindra XUV 3XO features are explained, you must know the price of each variant. Hence, we have prepared a table for you highlighting the ex-showroom price of each XUV 3XO variant: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variant Ex-Showroom Price MX1 Rs. 7.49 Lakhs MX2 Rs. 9.99 Lakhs MX2 PRO Rs. 8.99 Lakhs to Rs. 10.39 Lakhs MX3 Rs. 9.49 Lakhs to Rs. 11.68 Lakhs MX3 PRO Rs. 9.99 Lakhs to Rs. 11.49 Lakhs AX5 Rs. 10.69 Lakhs to Rs. 12.88 Lakhs AX5 Luxury Rs. 11.99 Lakhs to Rs. 13.49 Lakhs AX7 Rs. 12.49 Lakhs to Rs. 14.49 Lakhs AX7 Luxury Rs. 13.99 Lakhs to Rs. 15.49 Lakhs Note : The prices of the Mahindra XUV 3XO variants can change without any prior notice. So, before booking your car, talk with your nearest dealer to know the latest price. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants Unlatch Elated Driving Experience with the All New Mahindra XUV 3XO Making its presence felt in the Indian compact SUV market, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is one of the best cars in this segment manufactured by Mahindra. It offers more convenience and comfort when driving on different terrains. The following are detailed discussions of the Mahindra XUV 3XO tech specs and features: 1. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Comforting Interior When you drive the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it elevates your every journey. Stepping inside the XUV 3XOs cabin will let you discover a sanctuary of sophistication and comfort. It is one of the key parts of the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained, as it has a meticulous design for the finest SUV lovers. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Skyroof and soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard. Furthermore, the car has premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and a passive keyless entry. It also features a front armrest with storage and a console with a cup holder for a comfortable drive. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior 3. Smart Connectivity Another key Mahindra XUV 3XO configuration is its smart connectivity and technology. The car comes with a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system to make your drive enjoyable. In addition, the sound system lets you experience sonic expanse, and the bass enhancer technology uplifts your mood while driving in crowded areas. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation and has built-in Amazon Alexa for entertainment. Moreover, with the ADRENOX Connect technology, you can control your cars features through your smartphone from the comfort of', 'images': [{'url': 'https://acko-cms.ackoassets.com/image_21_09398560b1.webp', 'alt_text': 'image_21_09398560b1.webp', 'loading': 'lazy', 'confidence': 0.7}, {'url': 'https://acko-cms.ackoassets.com/Mahindra_XUV_3_XO_1_50764da01b.png', 'alt_text': 'Mahindra', 'width': '740', 'height': '400', 'loading': 'lazy', 'confidence': 0.7}], 'rank': 1}, {'url': 'https://www.spinny.com/cars/mahindra/xuv-3xo/expert-reviews/', 'content': "Mahindra XUV 3XO Review - Expert take on Features, Performance & Overall Verdict Buy car View all cars Used cars in Delhi NCR Used cars in Bangalore Used cars in Hyderabad Used cars in Mumbai Used cars in Pune Used cars in Delhi Used cars in Gurgaon Used cars in Noida Used cars in Ahmedabad Used cars in Chennai Used cars in Kolkata Used cars in Lucknow Used cars in Jaipur Used cars in Chandigarh Used cars in Coimbatore Used cars in Faridabad Used cars in Ghaziabad Used cars in Karnal Used cars in Kochi Used cars in Sonipat Used cars in Visakhapatnam Sell car Sell Car Online Sell cars in Ahmedabad Sell cars in Bangalore Sell cars in Chennai Sell cars in Delhi Sell cars in Gurgaon Sell cars in Hyderabad Sell cars in Kolkata Sell cars in Mumbai Sell cars in Noida Sell cars in Pune Sell cars in Lucknow Sell cars in Jaipur Sell Scrap Car More About Us About Spinny Investor Relations Car Finance Check your eligibility Know your EMI Spinny Finance process Pro Service How it Works Car buying process Car selling process Pricing Car Hub Locations Blog Customer Reviews Scrap Car Car valuation Check eChallan Check RTO Details Recharge FASTag Spinny Assured The sure road to Car Joy Spinny BuyBack Commit less, Drive more Spinny Partners Drive your business ahead Pro Service Hassle free car service Spinny Insurance Hassle free car insurance Shortlisted Account Your Account Call us at 727-727-7275 Overview Specs & Features Pricing & Variants Expert's Review User's Review F.A.Qs Colours Best Used Cars Images & Videos Home Cars Mahindra XUV 3XO Expert Reviews Mahindra XUV 3XO Expert Review 4 The Mahindra XUV 3XO emerges as a significant evolution in the subcompact SUV segment, building upon the foundation laid by its predecessor, the XUV300. With a bold new design, enhanced features, and advanced safety technologies, the XUV 3XO aims to cater to the modern urban driver. Under the hood, it offers a choice of efficient petrol and diesel engines, paired with both manual and automatic transmissions, ensuring versatility for various driving preferences. Inside, the cabin boasts a contemporary layout with a 10.25-inch touchscreen infotainment system, digital instrument cluster, and a panoramic sunroof, elevating the overall driving experience. In this expert review, we delve into the XUV 3XO's offerings to assess its position in the competitive compact SUV market. Exterior 4/5 Design 4/5 Paint Quality 4/5 Panel Gaps 4/5 Read More Interior 4/5 Design 4/5 Space 4/5 Comfort 4/5 Read More Safety 4/5 No. of Airbags 4 Features 4/5 Read More Performance 4/5 Stability 4/5 Eng. Response 4/5 Clutch & Gears 4/5 Read More Verdict The Mahindra XUV 3XO stands out as a compelling choice in the subcompact SUV segment, offering a harmonious blend of style, performance, and safety. Its array of features, coupled with top-tier safety ratings, make it a strong contender for those seeking a premium driving experience. While there are areas for improvement, such as rear seat space and variant offerings, the overall package it offers is impressive. Who should buy a Mahindra XUV 3XO The XUV 3XO is ideally suited for buyers seeking a stylish and safe subcompact SUV that doesn't compromise on features or comfort. It's perfect for urban commuters, small families, and first-time car buyers who prioritize safety and value. Those looking for a blend of efficiency, practicality, and modern design will find the XUV 3XO to be an excellent fit. Pros of Mahindra XUV 3XO Striking exterior design with modern styling elements. Feature-rich interior with premium materials and advanced technology. Comprehensive safety suite with a 5-star Bharat NCAP rating. Multiple engine options catering to different driving needs. Cons of Mahindra XUV 3XO Some advanced features are reserved for higher variants. Rear seat space may feel cramped for three adults on longer journeys. Limited diesel automatic variant options. Boot space of 364 liters may be less than some competitors. Users Also Viewed Spec", 'images': [], 'rank': 2}, {'url': 'https://www.autocarindia.com/car-reviews/mahindra-xuv-3xo-review-feature-and-power-packed-compact-suv-431439', 'content': "Mahindra XUV300, XUV 3XO review, design, interior, features, performance, first drive - Introduction | Autocar India All All Price News Reviews Features Specifications Images Videos All All Price News Reviews Features Specifications Images Videos Signup Login Find a Car Cars Compare Cars New Cars Upcoming Cars Car Price Car Loan Calculator Find a Bike Bikes Compare Bikes New New Bikes New Scooters Upcoming Upcoming Bikes Upcoming Scooters Electric Electric Bikes Electric Scooters Bike Price Bike Loan Calculator News Cars Bikes Motorsports Industry Marketplace Reviews Car First drive / Reviews Comparisons Video reviews Long-term reviews Bike First ride / Reviews Comparisons Video reviews Long-term reviews Features Features Travelogues Blogs Interviews Partner Content Galleries Videos Images Stories Advice Signup Login Home Car Reviews Mahindra XUV 3XO review - Feature and power packed compact SUV Mahindra XUV 3XO review - Feature and power packed compact SUV Out goes the Mahindra XUV300 and in comes the XUV 3XO. The new name is just the starting point of a very comprehensive upgrade. Updated on May 02, 2024 05:35:55 PM 86,851 Views Follow us on The XUV 3XO's styling is big on flash The diamond-shaped detailing on the lights and grille are a nice touch. The infotainment is now a 10.25-inch unit and works well. By Nikhil Bhatia Share - Make : Mahindra Model : XUV 3XO We Like Upmarket interior Strong engines Long equipment list We Don't Like Boot space Competent as the Mahindra XUV300 was, it never quite made it to the list of compact SUV bestsellers. Mahindra is now gunning for glory with the updated XUV300, christened the XUV 3XO. Mind you, this is no run-of-the-mill nip and tuck update. Mahindra has gone all out with a new look, redone interior, some class-first feature introductions, some class-best specifications and very enticing pricing. The aim is to take the fight to the Tata Nexon, Maruti Brezza, Kia Sonet and Hyundai Venue, and win. Mahindra XUV 3XO: design and styling Where the XUV300s styling was understated, the XUV 3XO is big on flash. Giving the 3XO its distinctive face are the large, new vertically oriented headlights outlined by C-shaped DRLs (a link to the larger XUV700). The headlights are split into two sections with a concealed projector unit up top, and an open projector fog lamp unit lower down, both set amidst a black surround. The lights flank the new grille, which is actually a gloss panel that runs much of the XUVs width. The new front bumper with its pronounced cuts and creases is very concept car-like and the newly contoured bonnet also does its bit to add volume to the design. New C-shaped LED DRLs provide a visual link with the larger XUV700. Like the XUV300, the 3XO looks muscular in profile, and furthering the impression are the stylish new 17-inch diamond cut alloy wheels that are the largest in the segment. Theres also chunkier side cladding with cuts at the wheel arches. Mahindra says ground clearance is a generous 201mm, up from the XUV300s figure of 180mm. Mahindra XUV 3XO Price, Mileage, Specifications, Features and Variants Brand Mahindra Model Name XUV 3XO Mahindra XUV 3XO Price 9.06 - 18.39 lakh Mahindra XUV 3XO Range/Mileage Petrol : 17.96 - 20.1kpl | Diesel : 20.6 - 21.2kpl Mahindra XUV 3XO Specifications SUV | 5 doors | 5 seats View All Specs Mahindra XUV 3XO Features LED headlight | 26.03-inch Touchscreen display | 6 airbags View All Features Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants MX1 1.2 Petrol MT | MX2 Pro 1.2 Petrol MT | MX3 1.2 Petrol MT View All Variants In its basic shape though, the 3XO is no different than the XUV300. The 2,600mm wheelbase remains class best, but the short overhangs, particularly at the back, tell you that this is a vehicle that's brutally shortened (remember it started life as a SsangYong Tivoli) to get length under the critical 4m mark, needed to qualify as a small car and hence a lower rate of tax. New 17-inch alloys are the largest in the segment. At the back, you sur", 'images': [{'url': 'https://img.autocarindia.com/ExtraImages/20240502111525_First Drive 3XO Web.001.jpeg?w=700&c=1', 'alt_text': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO review', 'title': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO review', 'class': 'img-fluid', 'confidence': 0.7999999999999999}, {'url': 'https://img.autocarindia.com/ExtraImages/20240502012130_First Drive 3XO Web.008.jpeg?w=700&c=1', 'alt_text': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO front quarter', 'title': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO front quarter', 'class': 'img-fluid', 'loading': 'lazy', 'confidence': 0.7999999999999999}, {'url': 'https://img.autocarindia.com/ExtraImages/20240502012130_First Drive 3XO Web.014.jpeg?w=700&c=1', 'alt_text': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO review - Feature and power packed compact SUV', 'title': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO review - Feature and power packed compact SUV', 'class': 'img-fluid', 'loading': 'lazy', 'confidence': 0.7999999999999999}, {'url': 'https://img.autocarindia.com/ExtraImages/20240502012130_First Drive 3XO Web.016.jpeg?w=700&c=1', 'alt_text': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO review - Feature and power packed compact SUV', 'title': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO review - Feature and power packed compact SUV', 'class': 'img-fluid', 'loading': 'lazy', 'confidence': 0.7999999999999999}, {'url': 'https://img.autocarindia.com/model/uploads/modelimages/Mahindra-XUV-3XO-290420241902.jpg', 'alt_text': 'Latest Image of Mahindra XUV 3XO', 'title': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO', 'class': 'img-fluid wid-img', 'loading': 'lazy', 'confidence': 0.7999999999999999}], 'rank': 3}, {'url': 'https://auto.mahindra.com/on/demandware.static/-/Sites-amc-Library/default/dw14bf6b46/X3XO/XUV3XOProductBrochure-01-07-24.pdf', 'content': '[no text]', 'images': [], 'rank': 4}, {'url': 'https://cargraze.com/blog/2025-mahindra-xuv-3xo-specs-design-performance-and-safety', 'content': '2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO: Specs, Design, Performance, and Safety  | Cargraze Home Cars Car Blog Tools Loan EMI Calculator Mileage Calculator Sell Used Car Check RC Login/ Register Home Car Info 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO: Specs, Design, Performance, and Safety 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO: Specs, Design, Performance, and Safety Published On Dec 24, 2024 By Cargraze for Car Info A Comprehensive Review of the Mahindra XUV 3XO in 2025: Features, Performance, and Value Are you looking for a compact yet powerful vehicle that combines performance, safety, and value in one stunning package? The Mahindra XUV 3XO might be the car youre searching for! Lets dive into a detailed review to see what this model brings in 2025. Design and Exterior Highlights One look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO, especially in black, and its clear that this car is a head-turner. Its sporty design elements stand out with: Chrome Accents: The grille and headlamp finish feature stylish chrome highlights. Projector Headlamps with LED DRLs: These enhance visibility and aesthetics. Diamond-Cut Alloy Wheels: The 16-inch alloys add a premium feel to the vehicle. Safety Ratings: With six airbags and a five-star Global NCAP safety rating, this vehicle excels in safety. Roof Rails & Spoilers: Gloss-black roof rails and a sleek spoiler give it a bold presence on the road. Although the car lacks front parking sensors and certain accessories come as add-ons, its robust styling and road presence more than makes up for these minor drawbacks. Interior Comfort and Technology Step inside the Mahindra XUV 3XO, and youll be greeted by a modern and comfortable cabin: Dual-Tone Dashboard: Soft-touch materials on the doors and satin finishes on the levers add a premium touch. Advanced Infotainment System: A 10.25-inch infotainment display paired with a 10.25-inch digital instrument cluster ensures seamless access to information and entertainment. Steering Controls: A three-spoke leather-wrapped steering wheel includes controls for cruise and infotainment systems. Comfort Features: From automatic climate control with dual-zone functionality to wireless charging and a vanity mirror with illumination, convenience is a priority. While its disappointing that the glovebox isnt cooled or illuminated, the XUV 3XO compensates with thoughtful features like rear AC vents, adjustable headrests, and ample storage options. Performance and Engine Specifications Under the hood, the Mahindra XUV 3XO packs a punch with its turbocharged petrol engine: Engine Options: It comes with a 1.2-liter three-cylinder MPFI engine, delivering 109 BHP and 200 Nm of torque. Transmission: Choose between manual and automatic transmissions, depending on your driving preference. Fuel Efficiency: Mahindra claims an ARAI-certified mileage of 18.5 km/l, though real-world figures hover around 14-15 km/l. The cars ride quality, stability, and safety features like ABS with EBD, electronic stability control, and tyre pressure monitoring ensure a secure driving experience. Practicality and Storage With a 364-liter boot space, the XUV 3XO offers decent storage capacity. However, operating the boot can feel a bit cumbersome due to its electromagnetic button placement. The spare wheel, tool kit, and first-aid essentials are neatly arranged but require some effort to access. Final Thoughts The Mahindra XUV 3XO is an impressive contender in the compact SUV segment. While it has its minor quirks, the blend of safety, design, and performance makes it a strong value-for-money option in its price range. Would we recommend it? Absolutely! Add it to your shortlist and take it for a spin to see if its the perfect fit for your needs. Dont forget to share your thoughts on this versatile vehicle in the comments section! Comments Search Posts Recent Posts Is the Toyota Hilux Ideal for Adventurers and Professionals? T002.initial_thoughts: Okay, I need to analyze the provided content about the Mahindra XUV 3XO and extract its key features related to engine, safety, interior, exterior, and technology. I'll focus on unique selling points and important aspects, and structure the output as a JSON object with bullet points.

summary_bullets: **Engine Specifications:** Offers both petrol and diesel engine options, including a 1.2-liter turbocharged petrol engine with manual and automatic transmissions.

**Exterior Design:** Features a bold and modern design with LED DRLs, infinity tail lamps, and 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels, athletic stance and ample ground clearance of 201 mm for rocky terrains.

**Interior Features:** Focuses on comfort and sophistication with a meticulous design, including a Skyroof, soft-touch leatherette on door trims and dashboard, premium leatherette seats, cooled glovebox with illumination, and passive keyless entry.

**Technology:** Comes with smart connectivity features, including a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system, a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation, built-in Amazon Alexa, and ADRENOX Connect technology for controlling car features via smartphone.
**Safety Features:** Emphasizes safety with features like six airbags and a five-star Global NCAP safety rating. Additional features include ABS with EBD and electronic stability control.

limitations: Some potentially relevant information might be missing due to content extraction limits on some URLs.
recommendations: Consider fetching more complete content from the provided URLs for a more comprehensive summary.

output.fallback_markdown:
# Mahindra XUV 3XO Features

## Engine
* Offers both petrol and diesel options

## Exterior
* Bold design with LED DRLs

## Interior
* Focuses on comfort with a Skyroof

## Technology
* Smart connectivity with Harman Kardon audio

## Safety
* Six airbags and five-star Global NCAP rating

ðŸ“Š Mahindra XUV 3XO Analysis Report

ðŸŽ¯ Executive Summary

The Mahindra XUV 3XO is a newly launched vehicle featuring both petrol and diesel engine options, a bold exterior design, a focus on interior comfort, smart technology connectivity, and a strong emphasis on safety. Key highlights include its five-star Global NCAP safety rating and smart connectivity features like built-in Amazon Alexa.

Engine Specifications

The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers both petrol and diesel engine options, including a 1.2-liter turbocharged petrol engine with manual and automatic transmissions.

Exterior Design

The vehicle features a bold and modern design with LED DRLs, infinity tail lamps, and 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels, athletic stance and ample ground clearance of 201 mm for rocky terrains.

Interior Features

The interior focuses on comfort and sophistication with a meticulous design, including a Skyroof, soft-touch leatherette on door trims and dashboard, premium leatherette seats, cooled glovebox with illumination, and passive keyless entry.

Technology

The XUV 3XO comes with smart connectivity features, including a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system, a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation, built-in Amazon Alexa, and ADRENOX Connect technology for controlling car features via smartphone.

Safety Features

The vehicle emphasizes safety with features like six airbags and a five-star Global NCAP safety rating. Additional features include ABS with EBD and electronic stability control.

The infotainment is now a 10.25-inch unit and works well. By Nikhil Bhatia Share - Make : Mahindra Model : XUV 3XO We Like Upmarket interior Strong engines Long equipment list We Don't Like Boot space Competent as the Mahindra XUV300 was, it never quite made it to the list of compact SUV bestsellers. Mahindra is now gunning for glory with the updated XUV300, christened the XUV 3XO. Mind you, this is no run-of-the-mill nip and tuck update. Mahindra has gone all out with a new look, redone interior, some class-first feature introductions, some class-best specifications and very enticing pricing. The aim is to take the fight to the Tata Nexon, Maruti Brezza, Kia Sonet and Hyundai Venue, and win. Mahindra XUV 3XO: design and styling Where the XUV300s styling was understated, the XUV 3XO is big on flash. Giving the 3XO its distinctive face are the large, new vertically oriented headlights outlined by C-shaped DRLs (a link to the larger XUV700). The headlights are split into two sections with a concealed projector unit up top, and an open projector fog lamp unit lower down, both set amidst a black surround. The lights flank the new grille, which is actually a gloss panel that runs much of the XUVs width. The new front bumper with its pronounced cuts and creases is very concept car-like and the newly contoured bonnet also does its bit to add volume to the design. New C-shaped LED DRLs provide a visual link with the larger XUV700. Like the XUV300, the 3XO looks muscular in profile, and furthering the impression are the stylish new 17-inch diamond cut alloy wheels that are the largest in the segment. Theres also chunkier side cladding with cuts at the wheel arches. Mahindra says ground clearance is a generous 201mm, up from the XUV300s figure of 180mm. Mahindra XUV 3XO Price, Mileage, Specifications, Features and Variants Brand Mahindra Model Name XUV 3XO Mahindra XUV 3XO Price 9.06 - 18.39 lakh Mahindra XUV 3XO Range/Mileage Petrol : 17.96 - 20.1kpl | Diesel : 20.6 - 21.2kpl Mahindra XUV 3XO Specifications SUV | 5 doors | 5 seats View All Specs Mahindra XUV 3XO Features LED headlight | 26.03-inch Touchscreen display | 6 airbags View All Features Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants MX1 1.2 Petrol MT | MX2 Pro 1.2 Petrol MT | MX3 1.2 Petrol MT View All Variants In its basic shape though, the 3XO is no different than the XUV300. The 2,600mm wheelbase remains class best, but the short overhangs, particularly at the back, tell you that this is a vehicle that's brutally shortened (remember it started life as a SsangYong Tivoli) to get length under the critical 4m mark, needed to qualify as a small car and hence a lower rate of tax. New 17-inch alloys are the largest in the segment. Feature and power packed compact SUV', 'title': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO review - Feature and power packed compact SUV', 'class': 'img-fluid', 'loading': 'lazy', 'confidence': 0.7999999999999999}, {'url': 'https://img.autocarindia.com/model/uploads/modelimages/Mahindra-XUV-3XO-290420241902.jpg', 'alt_text': 'Latest Image of Mahindra XUV 3XO', 'title': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO', 'class': 'img-fluid wid-img', 'loading': 'lazy', 'confidence': 0.7999999999999999}], 'rank': 3}, {'url': 'https://auto.mahindra.com/on/demandware.static/-/Sites-amc-Library/default/dw14bf6b46/X3XO/XUV3XOProductBrochure-01-07-24.pdf', 'content': '[no text]', 'images': [], 'rank': 4}, {'url': 'https://cargraze.com/blog/2025-mahindra-xuv-3xo-specs-design-performance-and-safety', 'content': '2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO: Specs, Design, Performance, and Safety  | Cargraze Home Cars Car Blog Tools Loan EMI Calculator Mileage Calculator Sell Used Car Check RC Login/ Register Home Car Info 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO: Specs, Design, Performance, and Safety 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO: Specs, Design, Performance, and Safety Published On Dec 24, 2024 By Cargraze for Car Info A Comprehensive Review of the Mahindra XUV 3XO in 2025: Features, Performance, and Value Are you looking for a compact yet powerful vehicle that combines performance, safety, and value in one stunning package? The Mahindra XUV 3XO might be the car youre searching for! Lets dive into a detailed review to see what this model brings in 2025. Design and Exterior Highlights One look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO, especially in black, and its clear that this car is a head-turner. Its sporty design elements stand out with: Chrome Accents: The grille and headlamp finish feature stylish chrome highlights. Projector Headlamps with LED DRLs: These enhance visibility and aesthetics. Diamond-Cut Alloy Wheels: The 16-inch alloys add a premium feel to the vehicle. Safety Ratings: With six airbags and a five-star Global NCAP safety rating, this vehicle excels in safety. Roof Rails & Spoilers: Gloss-black roof rails and a sleek spoiler give it a bold presence on the road. Although the car lacks front parking sensors and certain accessories come as add-ons, its robust styling and road presence more than makes up for these minor drawbacks. Interior Comfort and Technology Step inside the Mahindra XUV 3XO, and youll be greeted by a modern and comfortable cabin: Dual-Tone Dashboard: Soft-touch materials on the doors and satin finishes on the levers add a premium touch. Advanced Infotainment System: A 10.25-inch infotainment display paired with a 10.25-inch digital instrument cluster ensures seamless access to information and entertainment. Steering Controls: A three-spoke leather-wrapped steering wheel includes controls for cruise and infotainment systems. Comfort Features: From automatic climate control with dual-zone functionality to wireless charging and a vanity mirror with illumination, convenience is a priority. While its disappointing that the glovebox isnt cooled or illuminated, the XUV 3XO compensates with thoughtful features like rear AC vents, adjustable headrests, and ample storage options. Performance and Engine Specifications Under the hood, the Mahindra XUV 3XO packs a punch with its turbocharged petrol engine: Engine Options: It comes with a 1.2-liter three-cylinder MPFI engine, delivering 109 BHP and 200 Nm of torque. Transmission: Choose between manual and automatic transmissions, depending on your driving preference. Fuel Efficiency: Mahindra claims an ARAI-certified mileage of 18.5 km/l, though real-world figures hover around 14-15 km/l. The cars ride quality, stability, and safety features like ABS with EBD, electronic stability control, and tyre pressure monitoring ensure a secure driving experience. Practicality and Storage With a 364-liter boot space, the XUV 3XO offers decent storage capacity. However, operating the boot can feel a bit cumbersome due to its electromagnetic button placement. The spare wheel, tool kit, and first-aid essentials are neatly arranged but require some effort to access. Final Thoughts The Mahindra XUV 3XO is an impressive contender in the compact SUV segment. While it has its minor quirks, the blend of safety, design, and performance makes it a strong value-for-money option in its price range. Would we recommend it? Absolutely! Add it to your shortlist and take it for a spin to see if its the perfect fit for your needs. Dont forget to share your thoughts on this versatile vehicle in the comments section! nodes.description: Distill the fetched information into a concise summary of the key features.
nodes.agent_prompt: Analyze the information fetched in T001 and distill the key features of the Mahindra XUV 3XO. Summarize the engine specifications, safety features, interior features, exterior design, and technology in a concise and structured manner. Focus on highlighting the unique selling points and most important aspects of the vehicle. Output the summary in a JSON format.

output.initial_thoughts: Okay, I need to analyze the provided content about the Mahindra XUV 3XO and extract its key features related to engine, safety, interior, exterior, and technology. I'll focus on unique selling points and important aspects, and structure the output as a JSON object with bullet points.

summary_bullets: **Engine Specifications:** Offers both petrol and diesel engine options, including a 1.2-liter turbocharged petrol engine with manual and automatic transmissions.

**Exterior Design:** Features a bold and modern design with LED DRLs, infinity tail lamps, and 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels, athletic stance and ample ground clearance of 201 mm for rocky terrains.

**Interior Features:** Focuses on comfort and sophistication with a meticulous design, including a Skyroof, soft-touch leatherette on door trims and dashboard, premium leatherette seats, cooled glovebox with illumination, and passive keyless entry.

**Technology:** Comes with smart connectivity features, including a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system, a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation, built-in Amazon Alexa, and ADRENOX Connect technology for controlling car features via smartphone.
**Safety Features:** Emphasizes safety with features like six airbags and a five-star Global NCAP safety rating. Additional features include ABS with EBD and electronic stability control.

limitations: Some potentially relevant information might be missing due to content extraction limits on some URLs.

The Mahindra XUV 3XO is a newly launched vehicle featuring both petrol and diesel engine options, a bold exterior design, a focus on interior comfort, smart technology connectivity, and a strong emphasis on safety. Key highlights include its five-star Global NCAP safety rating and smart connectivity features like built-in Amazon Alexa.

Engine Specifications

The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers both petrol and diesel engine options, including a 1.2-liter turbocharged petrol engine with manual and automatic transmissions.

Exterior Design

The vehicle features a bold and modern design with LED DRLs, infinity tail lamps, and 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels, athletic stance and ample ground clearance of 201 mm for rocky terrains.

Interior Features

The interior focuses on comfort and sophistication with a meticulous design, including a Skyroof, soft-touch leatherette on door trims and dashboard, premium leatherette seats, cooled glovebox with illumination, and passive keyless entry.

Technology

The XUV 3XO comes with smart connectivity features, including a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system, a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation, built-in Amazon Alexa, and ADRENOX Connect technology for controlling car features via smartphone.

Safety Features

The vehicle emphasizes safety with features like six airbags and a five-star Global NCAP safety rating. Additional features include ABS with EBD and electronic stability control.
